name: Margarita
description: She's a runner...she's a track star. Needs to stretch her legs every day so she needs a very active human.

name: Licorice
description: He is precious, with eyes that show her beautiful soul. He is an ex-racing dog of a mature age and doesn't have the energy to move around alot. The happiest when he is lounging in the sun.

name: CarlyK
description: Precious, bubbly and a great conversatinalist. Note she is obsessed with cardboard boxes. Carly will be the family member you didn't know you needed.

name: T Challa
description: Acts like the king he is named after. Poised and Regal. Has a thing where he will only eat after you hand feed him a kibble first, which is absolutely adorable. Did we mention he acts like a king?  He is also very funny and loves to turn around in circles.

name: Breezy
description: He is very hyper. Make sure have loads of energy for this one.  If you have children in the household that's even better. Favorite food is carrots.

name: Gamora
description: We find Gamora to be sweet and protective. She will most likely sit next to you in guard position whenever you are in the same room. She is a smart girl.  She was taught to high five in just a few short weeks. Gamora is so cool. You will love spending your life with her.

name: Lady Gaga
description: She gives great cuddles and kisses.  Like the original Gaga, she loves to sing.

name: Cheech
description: He is very hyper. Make sure you have loads of energy for this one.  If you have children in the household that's even better. Favorite food is carrots.

name: Louie
description: Calm, sensitive type. Louie wants lots of attention. Loves to watch movies. He will make the best addition to your family.
